bibl.title: P. Oxy. 3876, Frr. 1-24: The Meleager Myth. Avec résumé en grec.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LVII, 3876, frr. 1-24. Examines the Stesichorean version of the Meleager myth in the hope of eliciting some features that will enable to compare it with both the preceding (epic) and succeeding (classical) mythical accounts. Takes a closer look at the text of frr. 2.6 and 4.4f.
bibl.seg: TSITSIBAKOU-VASALOS Evanthia, P. Oxy. 3876, Frr. 1-24: The Meleager Myth. Avec résumé en grec.

P. Oxy. LVII, 3876, frr. 1-24. Examines the Stesichorean version of the Meleager myth in the hope of eliciting some features that will enable to compare it with both the preceding (epic) and succeeding (classical) mythical accounts. Takes a closer look at the text of frr. 2.6 and 4.4f.
